column4: My laptop isn't suspending (but only sometimes) this is a new issue so I'm guessing something I installed is causing it, where can I find the log that would tell me what is preventing it from suspending?

My laptop isn't suspending (but only sometimes) this is a new issue so I'm guessing something I installed is causing it, where can I find the log that would tell me what is preventing it from suspending?
do you know which log specifically might contain some useful info?
